topic: RAG system planning and next steps
summary: Discussed the RAG system architecture and planned next steps for 2025. Alice proposed using hierarchical embeddings and metadata filtering.
follow_ups: Bob will research FAISS indexing performance.
Alice will document next steps for RAG implementation in Q4 2025.

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: For next steps in our RAG system, we should implement hierarchical embeddings by Q4 2025.

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: Good idea. The metadata filtering will help reduce search space significantly.

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: Yes, and we need to test with real meeting transcripts soon.
